Alright, I see that many of the responses are pretty long. That's not a bad thing, but it's different from what I expected. Considering MonikAI would react to every single action and it would basically trigger a 1 minute monologue (and often the same over and over again). So I propose two ideas:
* Make Monika only react *sometimes* (random or time based) - aka should Monika *always* make a comment when something happens (an action is triggered)
* Leave it as is, but add more short reactions. This may dilute the "Monika Experience" a bit though
Leave your comments below or something. I don't know how this Google Docs thing works. Do your worst.
